creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: Gold presentation box, cartouche-shaped, scalloped; surface chased with swastika-fret design. Bears the emblem of Lan Tsai-Ho, a basket of flowers, which trail over the cover. One of a set of 8 presented to Emperor Ch'ien Lung in the 43rd year of his reign.
medium: Cast and chased gold with rubies, sapphires and jade
title: Cartouche Shaped Presentation Box
